description: This course develops and stimulates research into the emotional/expressive properties of painting. By investigating thematic, compositional, and technical problems, students develop a personalized approach to ideas and content. Students learn the importance of process, flexibility, alternatives, and the recognition that a painting has a life of its own. Prerequisites: Art 102 or Art 111 and 112 (or 110), and 113. Materials fee. Offered annually.
name: Oil/Acrylic Painting
prerequisites: Prerequisites: Art 102 or Art 111 and 112 (or 110), and 113. Materials fee. Offered annually.
